forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night embraces a gentle calm, the city twinkling like a collection of stars scattered upon the dark fabric of the earth. Underneath a partly cloudy sky, the chill of the early morning wraps around you softly as the temperature hovers around 47 degrees. Quiet whispers of a west-southwest wind brush by, barely noticeable yet ever-present, heralding the arrival of a new day. 

As Saturday dawns, the clouds are anticipated to yield to a tapestry of sunlight, warming the city to a comfortable 65 degrees before tempering into a cooler afternoon. The fog, that elusive marine layer, dances in the distance but holds its breath for the moment, allowing glimpses of the iconic skyline and the Golden Gate Bridge to emerge proudly against the clear blue backdrop. It's a day that beckons you outdoors, perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to one of the local cafés where you can savor a quiet moment with your favorite book. Dress in layers—perhaps a light jacket over a comfortable shirt—so you can adapt as the sun makes its ascent and the day unfolds into a beautiful San Francisco afternoon, inviting you to revel in the gentle contrast of warmth and the cool ocean breeze.
